testcase.name: User creates request for a new program with the LMS API endpoint
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request and request Body for new Program with mandatory ,additional fields.passed Then User receives 201 Created Status with response body for program........passed

testcase.name: User create program with valid endpoint and existing Program name.
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request and request Body for Program with existing values in program name..passed Then User receives 400 Bad Request Status with message for existing values in program name..passed

testcase.name: Users are able to update a program with valid programID and mandatory request body
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request with mandatory and additional fields to update a Program with valid program ID.passed Then User receives 200 ok Status code with response body for update.........passed

testcase.name: User able to update a program with valid programName and mandatory request body
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request with mandatory and additional fields for Program with valid program name.passed Then User receives 200 ok Status code with response body for update.........passed

testcase.name: User able to retrieve a program with valid programID and LMS API
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request to view Program with valid program ID.........passed Then User receives 200 OK Status with response body to view Program with valid program ID.passed

testcase.name: User able to delete a program with valid programId and mandatory request body
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request to delete a Program with valid program ID.....passed Then User receive 200 Status with response body for delete a program with valid Id.passed

testcase.name: User able to delete a program with invalid programId and mandatory request body
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request to delete Program with invalid program ID.....passed Then User get 404 Status with response body for delete Program with invalid program ID.passed

testcase.name: User tries to update a program with invalid programID and mandatory request body
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request with mandatory and additional fields to update Program with invalid program ID.passed Then User receives 404 Status code with response body to update Program with invalid program ID.passed

testcase.name: User tries to update a program with invalid programName and mandatory request body
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request with mandatory and additional fields to update Program with invalid program Name.passed Then User receives 404 Status code with response body to update Program with invalid program Name.passed

testcase.name: User able to delete a program with invalid programName and mandatory request body
testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request to delete Program with invalid program name...passed Then User receives 404 Status code with response body to delete Program with invalid program name.passed

testcase.name: User create program with missing mandatory fields.

testcase.system-out: Given User creates request for the LMS API endpoint.........................passed When User sends HTTPS Request and request Body to create program with missing ALL mandatory fields..passed Then User receives 400 Bad Request Status with message to create Program with missing ALL mandatory fields.passed
